mapper.select: SELECT m.user_id, m.one_intro, m.carr_year, m.casting_price, codeArr_select(m.mc_area) mc_area, codeArr_select(m.mc_type) mc_type, codeArr_select(m.prog_style) prog_style, m.self_intro, m.career, m.inq, m.dt, m.user_name, (select count(*) from likes where target_no = m.user_id) AS cnt, F.SEV_NM img FROM MC_PRTFL m, LIKES l, FILES F WHERE M.USER_ID = L.TARGET_NO(+) AND M.IMG = F.F_NM(+) AND m.USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT * FROM REPLY WHERE BOARD_CAT = 'T06' AND REPLY_TGT = #{replyTgt}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MC_PRTFL(USER_ID, USER_NAME, ONE_INTRO, CARR_YEAR, CASTING_PRICE, MC_AREA, MC_TYPE, PROG_STYLE, SELF_INTRO, CAREER, img, DT) VALUES(#{userId}, #{userName}, #{oneIntro}, #{carrYear}, #{castingPrice}, #{mcArea}, #{mcType}, #{progStyle}, #{selfIntro}, #{career}, #{img}, SYSDATE)
